title: First all-electric passenger airplane prepares to fly
description: The world's first all-electric passenger aircraft is preparing to take flight.

title: Some Trump records handed over to Jan. 6 committee had been ripped up
Mike Pence's former chief of staff testifies in House January 6 investigation
description: Marc Short, former Vice President Mike Pence's chief of staff, quietly testified before the House select committee investigating January 6 last week in response to a subpoena, sources tell CNN, in the most significant sign to date that Pence's team is cooperating with the probe.

title: Former Pence aide explains what this testimony may reveal
description: Former Trump communications director Alyssa Farah Griffin and former Trump campaign adviser David Urban talk with CNN's Jake Tapper about Marc Short, former Vice President Mike Pence's chief of staff, testifying before the House select committee investigating January 6, after being subpoenaed.

title: 'A highly gifted jurist': Sen. Graham on one of Biden's potential Supreme Court picks
description: As President Biden considers who to nominate to replace Justice Stephen Breyer, several new names are emerging. One of the potential picks may have the support of a Trump loyalist. CNN's Jessica Schneider has more.

title: US TV host Hoda Kotb announces split from fiancé
description: NBC "TODAY" host Hoda Kotb shares why she and fiancé Joel Schiffman have broken up.

title: Europe could face a crisis if Russia stops gas flow to Europe
description: Russia's reliability as a gas supplier for Europe takes a turn as conflict looms and fears over gas imports and energy disruption mount. CNN's Anna Stewart reports.

title: Mexico rated 'very high' risk for travel by the CDC
description: After more than six months in the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention's lower-risk Level 3 travel category, Mexico moved into "very high" risk Level 4 on Monday along with 11 other destinations.

title: UAE intercepts ballistic missile during Israeli President's visit
Theresa May savages Boris Johnson over parties scandal
George Soros warns China is facing an economic crisis
description: China is facing an economic crisis after a real estate boom ended with a bang last year, according to investor George Soros.

title: Nike suspends ties with Man United star amid domestic violence allegations
description: Nike has suspended its relationship with Manchester United  striker Mason Greenwood after allegations of domestic violence emerged against the 20-year-old England player.

title: Former UK Conservative MP: 'The fish rots from its head'
description: Former cabinet minister Rory Stewart says "any normal prime minister would have resigned by now" as he weighs in on the "partygate" scandal absorbing Boris Johnson

title: Mali's military rulers say French ambassador has 72 hours to leave the country
description: Mali's military authorities have expelled the French ambassador to the country in a 72-hour deadline announced Monday.

title: First patients vaccinated in clinical trial of HIV experimental vaccine that uses Moderna's mRNA technology
description: The first participants have been vaccinated in a Phase 1 clinical trial of an experimental HIV vaccine that utilizes Moderna's mRNA technology, the company announced last week.

title: Why lockdown parties in Downing Street are such a big deal
description: • Analysis: Can Boris Johnson survive as PM after 'Partygate' report?

title: This is what a $1 million home looks like in 4 European cities
description: From a three-bedroom penthouse in Madrid to a one-bed flat in central London, this is what $1 million gets you in four European capital cities.

title: Joe Rogan responds to backlash from Spotify artists
description: Joe Rogan has responded to the backlash he's received from Spotify artists surrounding Covid-19 misinformation on his popular podcast.

title: Former Miss USA Cheslie Kryst dies at 30
description: Former Miss USA Cheslie Kryst died Sunday morning, her family and police said. She was 30.

title: Increasing flood costs over next three decades will mainly impact people of color, study shows
description: The United States is already spending tens of billions of dollars a year on flood damage as hurricanes get more intense, sea level rises along the coasts and extreme weather becomes more frequent.

title: Rihanna and A$AP Rocky are expecting a baby
description: Rihanna has debuted a baby  bump.

title: What's next for tennis' 'Big Three' after Nadal's record-breaking grand slam victory?
description: There were three, but now Rafael Nadal stands on his own.

title: Rings in 'tree stump' crater found on Mars illuminate red planet's past climate
description: At first glance, it looks like a tree stump but the circular feature in a newly released image captured by the ExoMars orbiter is actually an ice-rich crater on Mars.

title: Physical activity monitors can get us on our feet more. How to make the most of the
description: The fitness tracker on your phone or wrist may be doing more than just monitoring your steps -- it could kick them up a notch.

title: Kamala Harris drove within several yards of pipe bomb at DNC headquarters during Capitol riot
description: Then-Vice President-elect Kamala Harris drove within several yards of a pipe bomb lying next to a bench outside the Democratic National Committee headquarters on January 6, 2021, and remained inside the DNC for nearly two hours before the bomb was discovered, according to multiple law enforcement officials familiar with the situation.

title: Bella Hadid opens up about her history of abusive relationships -- and how she broke the cycle
description: Supermodel Bella Hadid says lacking boundaries "sexually, physically, emotionally" led to her being abused in a number of unhealthy relationships.

title: How the upcoming Supreme Court battle can help Biden and Democrats in the midterms
description: Supreme Court Justice Stephen Breyer's retirement announcement last week comes at a vulnerable time for President Joe Biden. His approval rating is at its lowest point, 41%, in an average of polls. His decline is clear even among core Democratic groups.

title: How a group of Irish fishermen forced the Russian Navy into a U-turn
description: A fishing community on the southern tip of Ireland breathed a sigh of relief this weekend after the Russian government gave in to appeals from local fishermen who said naval drills ordered by Moscow off the Irish coast could endanger their livelihoods.

title: From visa denials to online trolling, foreign journalists in China say they face 'unprecedented hurdles'
Kim Jong Un wants the world to know he still matters. Seven missile tests in a month may prove it
description: Since the turn of the year, North Korea has ramped up missile tests in defiance of international law at a frenetic pace that many who keep a close eye on the rogue state expect to continue.

title: This may be the largest case of sex abuse by a single person in the US
This Lunar New Year dish is so tasty it's eaten all year
description: Not all Lunar New Year foods are created equal. Some only make a brief appearance at the festival for auspicious purposes. Others are so delicious they grace dim sum tables around the world all year.

title: Elon Musk offered a Florida teen $5,000 to delete a Twitter account tracking his jet. It wasn't enough
description: Josh Sweeney, a 19-year from Florida, rejected a $5,000 offer from Elon Musk to delete his Twitter account that tracks the billionaire's private jet.

title: Thai cave diver Rick Stanton reflects on mission to save 13 lives that transformed his own
